trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Dropbox for Business | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Dropbox for Business | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Dropbox for Business with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Dropbox for Business with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Dropbox for Business
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Dropbox for Business

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=522415).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=522415).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Dropbox for Business.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Dropbox for Business.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A test tenant in Dropbox for Business
trans-unit.target: A test tenant in Dropbox for Business

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Dropbox for Business will be able to single sign into the application at your Dropbox for Business company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](active-directory-saas-access-panel-introduction.md)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Dropbox for Business will be able to single sign into the application at your Dropbox for Business company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](active-directory-saas-access-panel-introduction.md)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Dropbox for Business
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Dropbox for Business

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Dropbox for Business
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Dropbox for Business

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Dropbox for Business.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Dropbox for Business.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Dropbox for Business, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Dropbox for Business, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Dropbox for Business**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Dropbox for Business**.

trans-unit.source: Application gallery
trans-unit.target: Application gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Dropbox for Business**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Dropbox for Business**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Dropbox for Business
trans-unit.target: Dropbox for Business

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Dropbox for Business with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Dropbox for Business with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: As part of this procedure, you are required to upload a base-64 encoded certificate to your Dropbox for Business tenant.
trans-unit.target: As part of this procedure, you are required to upload a base-64 encoded certificate to your Dropbox for Business tenant.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o).
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o).

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Dropbox for Business** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Dropbox for Business** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Dropbox for Business** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Dropbox for Business** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Sign-on to your Dropbox for business tenant.
trans-unit.target: Sign-on to your Dropbox for business tenant.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane on the left side, click **Admin Console**.
trans-unit.target: In the navigation pane on the left side, click **Admin Console**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769510.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769510.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: On the **Admin Console**, click **Authentication** in the left navigation pane.
trans-unit.target: On the **Admin Console**, click **Authentication** in the left navigation pane.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769511.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769511.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: In the **Single sign-on** section, select **Enable single sign-on**, and then click **More** to expand this section.
trans-unit.target: In the **Single sign-on** section, select **Enable single sign-on**, and then click **More** to expand this section.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769512.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769512.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: Copy the URL next to **Users can sign in by entering their email address or they can go directly to**.
trans-unit.target: Copy the URL next to **Users can sign in by entering their email address or they can go directly to**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769513.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769513.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: On the Azure portal, in the **DropBox for business sign in** URL textbox, paste the URL.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure portal, in the **DropBox for business sign in** URL textbox, paste the URL.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769514.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769514.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Dropbox for Business** page, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Dropbox for Business** page, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769515.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769515.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: On your Dropbox for Business tenant, in the **Single sign-on** section of the **Authentication** page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On your Dropbox for Business tenant, in the **Single sign-on** section of the **Authentication** page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769516.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769516.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: Click **Required**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Required**.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Dropbox for Business** dialog page, copy the **Sign-in page URL** value, and then paste it into the **Sign in URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Dropbox for Business** dialog page, copy the **Sign-in page URL** value, and then paste it into the **Sign in URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC749329.png "Configure single sign-on")
trans-unit.target: ![Configure single sign-on](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC749329.png "Configure single sign-on")

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable user provisioning of Active Directory user accounts to Dropbox for Business.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable user provisioning of Active Directory user accounts to Dropbox for Business.

trans-unit.source: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the **Dropbox for Business** application integration page, click **Configure user provisioning** to open the **Configure User Provisioning** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the **Dropbox for Business** application integration page, click **Configure user provisioning** to open the **Configure User Provisioning** dialog.

trans-unit.source: On the Enable user provisioning to DropBox for Business page, click Enable user provisioning to open the Sign in to Dropbox to link with Azure AD dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Enable user provisioning to DropBox for Business page, click Enable user provisioning to open the Sign in to Dropbox to link with Azure AD dialog.

trans-unit.source: User provisioning
trans-unit.target: User provisioning

trans-unit.source: On the **Sign in to Dropbox to link with Azure AD** dialog, sign in to your Dropbox for Business tenant.
trans-unit.target: On the **Sign in to Dropbox to link with Azure AD** dialog, sign in to your Dropbox for Business tenant.

trans-unit.source: ![User provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769518.png "User provisioning")
trans-unit.target: ![User provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769518.png "User provisioning")

trans-unit.source: Click **Allow** to grant Azure AD to access to Dropbox.
trans-unit.target: Click **Allow** to grant Azure AD to access to Dropbox.

trans-unit.source: ![User provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769519.png "User provisioning")
trans-unit.target: ![User provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769519.png "User provisioning")

trans-unit.source: To finish the configuration, click the **Complete** button.
trans-unit.target: To finish the configuration, click the **Complete** button.

trans-unit.source: ![User provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769520.png "User provisioning")
trans-unit.target: ![User provisioning](./media/active-directory-saas-dropboxforbusiness-tutorial/IC769520.png "User provisioning")

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Dropbox for Business, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Dropbox for Business, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Dropbox for Business **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Dropbox for Business **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: You should now wait for 10 minutes and verify that the account has been synchronized to Dropbox for Business.
trans-unit.target: You should now wait for 10 minutes and verify that the account has been synchronized to Dropbox for Business.

trans-unit.source: As a first verification step, you can check the provisioning status, by clicking **Dashboard** in the **Dropbox for Business** application integration page on the Azure Management Portal
trans-unit.target: As a first verification step, you can check the provisioning status, by clicking **Dashboard** in the **Dropbox for Business** application integration page on the Azure Management Portal

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: A successfully completed user provisioning cycle is indicated by a related status.
trans-unit.target: A successfully completed user provisioning cycle is indicated by a related status.

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](active-directory-saas-access-panel-introduction.md).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](active-directory-saas-access-panel-introduction.md).
